name: Loanshark
intro: Automation and Aggregation Platform for DeFi
introduce: Loanshark is an aggregation and automation platform for DeFi borrowers. Loanshark aggregates liquidity across different lending platforms with a protocol agnostic interface to provide the lowest borrowing rates. It also offers a automated position management toolbox that allows users to create automated on-chain workflows triggered by user pre-set conditions.
